meanings.sent1: The seatless bicycle was difficult to ride.
meanings.sent2: The bus was seatless, so we had to stand the whole way.
meanings.sent3: The seatless chair made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her car felt seatless after she removed the passenger seat.
meanings.sent5: The seatless stadium was packed with excited fans.

meanings.sent1: The seatless bench in the park was uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The train was seatless, causing discomfort during the long journey.
meanings.sent3: The seatless swing in the playground was a hit with the kids.
meanings.sent4: His speech was like a seatless boat, lacking support and structure.
meanings.sent5: The seatless rowboat rocked unsteadily in the water.
